FailedComponent.description: Metadata of submitted components failed to be processed for scanning

Feedback.description: Data Transfer Object for submitting user feedback about a specific report.

reasoning.description: Reasoning or explanation of the report

Image.description: Image data (required if SBOM is not provided)

OverviewMetrics.description: Metrics for the home page calculated from data in the last week

successfullyAnalyzed.description: The count of reports that were completed in the last week (reports with completed_at not null and date within last 7 days)

averageReliabilityScore.description: The average reliability score (intel_score) calculated as sum of all intel_score values divided by the count of completed reports from the last week

falsePositiveRate.description: The percentage of false positives identified from completed reports in the last week, calculated as (reports with output.analysis.0.justification.status='FALSE' / total completed reports) * 100

submittedAt.description: Timestamp of product scan request submission

submittedCount.description: Number of components submitted for scanning

submissionFailures.description: List of submitted components failed to be processed for scanning

completedAt.description: Timestamp of product scan request completion

cveId.description: CVE ID associated with this product

statusCounts.description: Map of analysis state to count of reports with that state

justificationStatusCounts.description: Map of justification status to count of reports with that status

submittedAt.description: Timestamp of product scan request submission

submittedCount.description: Number of components submitted for scanning

submissionFailures.description: List of submitted components failed to be processed for scanning

completedAt.description: Timestamp of product scan request completion

cveId.description: CVE ID associated with this product

statusCounts.description: Map of analysis state to count of reports with that state

justificationStatusCounts.description: Map of justification status to count of reports with that status

startedAt.description: Started at timestamp for report analysis

completedAt.description: Completed at timestamp for report analysis

vulns.description: Vulnerabilities in the report and their analysis results

metadata.description: User provided metadata for the report

ref.description: Git reference (commit hash, tag, or branch) from source_info

reportId.description: ID assigned on scan request submission

id.description: ID assigned on scan request submission (auto-generated if not provided)

vulnerabilities.description: List of vulnerability IDs to analyze

image.description: Image data (required if SBOM is not provided)

sbom.description: SBOM data (required if image is not provided)

sourceRepo.description: Source code repository (required if SBOM is not provided)

commitId.description: Commit ID (required if SBOM is not provided)

reportId.description: ID assigned on scan request submission

ReportWithStatus.description: Report data with calculated analysis status

status.description: Calculated analysis status of the report (completed, queued, sent, expired, failed, pending, unknown)

ref.description: Git reference (commit hash, tag, or branch)

include.description: Patterns to include in the analysis

exclude.description: Patterns to exclude from the analysis

job_id.description: The job run id in which the trace and spans were instrumented

trace_id.description: The id corresponding to one agent stage, grouping underneath all spans of sub-tasks embedded in the agent stage

span_id.description: The id corresponding to one sub task inside one agent stage.

span_payload.description: free style span payload without restrictions, containing all span metadata and istrumentation data

UserComments.description: User provided comments on a vulnerability

ValidationErrorResponse.description: Validation error response mapping field names to error messages

errors.description: Map of field names to error messages

jwt.description: Please enter your JWT Token without Bearer

parameters.name: language

400.description: Bad request - Wrong assignment of query parameters

get.description: Retrieves the most recent batch run metadata according to specific language or not

get.summary: Get eval metrics data documents containing metrics score of llm stages in
get.description: Retrieves a list of eval metrics documents with data and scores of llm stages in jobs runs by several filtering combinations, by jobId, by traceId,or all eval documents if none of the query-parameters are supplied

400.description: Bad request - Wrong assignment of query parameters

tags.name: ML-OPS Audit 1 - Batch Resource
tags.description: resource related to ML-OPS audit batch metadata and data, with its respective operations

tags.name: ML-OPS Audit 2 - Job Resource
tags.description: resource related to ML-OPS audit job runs metadata and data, with its respective operations

tags.name: ML-OPS Audit 3 - Trace Resource
tags.description: resource related to ML-OPS traces and span entries created in agent job runs and with its respective operations

tags.name: ML-OPS Audit 4 - Eval Resource
tags.description: resource related to ML-OPS audit curated evaluation metrics recorded scores of a job run' LLM Stages with its respective operations
